entity.deltaImportQuery: select t.*,'jcy_gas_info' tablename,'business' groupname from jcy_gas_info t where t.GAS_ID='${dataimporter.delta.GAS_ID}'
entity.name: jcy_gas_info
entity.query: select t.*,'jcy_gas_info' tablename,'business' groupname from jcy_gas_info t

entity.deltaImportQuery: select t.*,'case' tablename,'business' groupname from jcy_case_info t where t.CASE_ID='${dataimporter.delta.CASE_ID}'
entity.name: case
entity.query: select t.*,t.CASE_ID caseId,'case' tablename,'business' groupname from jcy_case_info t

entity.parentDeltaQuery: select CASE_ID from case where CASE_ID=${undertaker.CASE_ID}
entity.name: undertaker
entity.query: select t.* from jcy_case_undertaker_info t where t.CASE_ID='${case.CASE_ID}'

entity.parentDeltaQuery: select CASE_ID from case where CASE_ID=${file.CASE_ID}
entity.deltaQuery: select CASE_ID from jcy_file_info where update_time>'${dataimporter.last_index_time}' and file_type!='03'
entity.name: file
entity.query: select * from jcy_file_info where CASE_ID='${case.CASE_ID}' and file_type!='03'

entity.parentDeltaQuery: select CASE_ID from case where CASE_ID=${queried.CASE_ID}
entity.name: queried
entity.query: select CONCAT_WS(' ',name,sex,age,id_card,tel,COMPANY_POSITION) queried_txt from jcy_case_queried_info where CASE_ID='${case.CASE_ID}'

entity.parentDeltaQuery: select CASE_ID from case where CASE_ID=${parties.CASE_ID}
entity.name: parties
entity.query: select CONCAT_WS(' ',name,sex,age,id_card,tel,COMPANY_POSITION) parties_txt from jcy_case_parties_info where CASE_ID='${case.CASE_ID}'

entity.deltaImportQuery: select t.*,'privateFile' tablename,'business' groupname from jcy_file_info t where t.FILE_ID='${dataimporter.delta.FILE_ID}'
entity.name: file
entity.query: select t.*,'file' tablename,'business' groupname from jcy_file_info t

entity.deltaImportQuery: select t.*,'jcy_device_info' tablename,'business' groupname from jcy_device_info t where t.ID='${dataimporter.delta.ID}'
entity.name: jcy_device_info
entity.query: select t.*,'jcy_device_info' tablename,'business' groupname from jcy_device_info t
